newsitem.title: NORWAY: Elkem has slump in Q3 operating result.
newsitem.headline: Elkem has slump in Q3 operating result.

text.p: Norwegian metals producer Elkem ASA said on Tuesday its operating result in the third quarter fell 48 percent compared with profits in the second quarter.
The company booked an operating profit of 161 million crowns in the third quarter against 309 million crowns in the three month period to June 30.

"The considerable decline in the result compared with the second quarter can be attributed partly to conditions specific to the third quarter, namely a decline in own production of power, a writedown of ferrochrome stockpiles and seasonally low sales of several of the group's main products," Elkem said in a statement to the Oslo bourse.
